This luxury vehicle is packed with features such as multifunctional streering wheel, double sunroof, parking assist, electric seats, cruise control and navigational system etc.

Trade-ins welcome.
Nationwide delivery service available on request.

attributes.description:
2022 FORD ECOSPORT 1.5TiVCT AMBIENTE A/T
This quality used vehicle is at Motus Ford Paarden Eiland, just next to the N1 in Cape Town. We deliver nationwide and will arrange your finance and insurance with ease. We have a full range pre-owned Ford and other popular brands of used vehicles. We would like to give you the best deal on a used car or low mileage demo vehicle.
We also offer value added products such as:
Mechanical Breakdown Warranty
Maintenance and Service Plans
Crystal Fusion Windshield Protection / Reduces Night Glare
Restore it Care – Bodyline and Interior Maintenance
Matrix – Beame Recovery
Smash & Grab Window Protection

attributes.title: 2022 Kia Sorento 2.2D SXL AWD Auto

attributes.description:
KIA SPORTAGE 2.0 IGNITE + A/T
Stunning, spacious Sportage in immaculate condition. Full service history. Central locking, aircon, airbag, radio with bluetooth and USB. Power steering with controls on steering wheel. Electric windows and mirrors. Reverse camera with sensors to assist with parking. Automatic transmission that allows for a comfortable drive for you and your family. Visit your KIA Konfidence dealership in the Westrand, situated in Wilropark, Roodepoort and book this SUV for a test drive. Trade ins accepted. Nationwide delivery.

KIA RIO 1.4 MT EX
Stunning Rio in excellent condition. Full service history. Central locking, airbag, aircon, radio with bluetooth and USB. Power steering with controls on steering wheel. Electric windows and mirrors.
